name: Comfort Inn & Suites San Francisco Airport East

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This Comfort Inn we feel was a good stay for the $$. I was a little nervous after reading some of the other tripadvisor reviews but our overall stay turned out too be better than I had anticipated. We were looking for a lower priced hotel near San Franscico ( about 9 miles away 15 minutes), we stayed for 2 days.
reviews.title: Comfort Inn East San Bruno Ca.

reviews.text: The customer service was good the rooms were very clean, beds were comfortable, and the room was much larger than a typical Comfort standard room. The area that the hotel is located in is a little different, you would expect it to be in a high commercial area , but this property is in a combination light commercial, and older residential area. Just seems to not really fit in to the typical normal hotel area. We had no problem with the area, it was quiet and easy to find with a GPS.
reviews.title: Budget price and just fine

reviews.text: The breakfast area was small, the staff running the breakfast area did a great job, the area and set up were clean and the breakfast was modest but good and all items were fresh.
reviews.title: Shuttle Issues

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: all in all this was a good overall stay for the money.
reviews.title: Great Value & Location

reviews.text: The hotel staff was lovely when I checked in. I had been upgraded to a suite. I liked that the windows opened. Occasionally the flights overhead were loud, but that was done by the time I went to bed. Overall, I was very comfortable here. I had an early flight, and the shuttle worked fine for me. I didn't try the exercise equipment or breakfast.
reviews.title: Horrible stay, hotel had a funk and wish staff was nicer
Comfortable, convenient location; renovated; "iffy" neighborhood....
reviews.text: I had stayed at this hotel several years ago, and chose it again at short notice. I found that the rooms had been nicely renovated in the intervening period, and they were comfortable and clean. Front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. Location is only a five-minute drive from the SFO rental car facility, and the availability of a car would be good if you needed to find nearby restaurants, as there are none in the immediate area. Parking is free, a nice bonus, but the garage space is not that large.

Breakfast is adequate, with waffles, scrambled eggs, sausage. Beds are comfortable, but the pillows are small, hard, and quite annoying. (I mentioned this at check-out and was told that they were being replaced in January.)
reviews.title: Better than expected...but I didn't expect much anyway

reviews.text: I think that this would be a nice choice for an overnight stay between flights, or a longer stay if you have access to a car. Again, I was very pleased by all the staff members I encountered!
reviews.title: Great staff, clean, noisy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A possible negative is that some departing flights pass directly overhead, depending on wind direction, but that didn't happen very often.
reviews.title: Not good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was the first hotel we stayed at on a 4-night Pacific Coast Highway trip. I took advantage of Choice’s Best Rate Guarantee which made the night free (Sans a $1.00 occupancy tax) and wasn’t expecting much as a result. I was happy to be proven wrong.
reviews.title: Great service

reviews.text: This hotel's manager's wife has serious issues. She, an Indian, would like to walk in leisurely anytime she wishes and find issues to scold employees in front of customers, somethings that she could have probably found by being available earlier.
reviews.title: Problem with top managment

reviews.text: She also claims that she is the owner though it is her husband listed as owner in the reception
reviews.title: Could have done better for a one night stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Donot expect her to treat the customer any better.
reviews.title: Incredibly helpful staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you feel like calling the cops.. hmm.. i would say just find a different hotel
reviews.title: Five minutes from rental car return!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also the cleaning lady stole a few brand new hair clips which were unopened
reviews.title: A Delightful Surprise & Pleasant Stay

reviews.text: Very clean property, comfortable beds,easy airport access, substantial breakfast and very friendly staff. More than expected and great for the price. Good value and will stay again.
reviews.title: Perect for the price

reviews.text: we stayed 1 night using a park and fly package. The shuttle was promt and the service was great. We were traveling with some friends and had requested a double room and recived a suite when we got there for the same price as the double.they moved our car into the civered parking during out trip to better protect it . their service was great.
reviews.title: Great service

reviews.text: Hotel clean and very helpful staff . Great breakfast, plentiful and varied: there is everything.
reviews.title: Excellent quality/price for visiting San Francisco

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: San Francisco Airport Shuttle.
reviews.title: Don't do it

reviews.text: Good opportunity to reach San Francisco by public transport: about 15 minutes walk to BART and Caltrain (with this train is quickly reached the center of San Francisco and the cities south of the Bay, like Palo Alto and San Jose).
reviews.title: CI - SF Airport

aka: Comfort Inn & Suites San Francisco Airport East Hotel San Bruno
